citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:52 AM on
7/16/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and speaking to the Licensee who
stated no one was available for an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection
is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:52 AM on 
7/16/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and speaking to the Licensee who 
stated no one was available for an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection 
is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
